In 1961, Grady & Ann Phillips opened “The Sport and Hobby Shop” in an 840 sf vacancy in the Pruitt Shopping Center in Anderson, SC. This store stocked model cars, fishing supplies, athletic goods and a total of two guns. Growth came quickly and in 1963, the store was moved 3 doors down in the shopping center to a 1,400 sf location. Here Grady and Ann added more firearms, toys, games and even Barbie Dolls!

As the business continued to grow, it was moved in 1965 to a 2,400 sf building in the then-new Belvedere Plaza Shopping Center. Horseback riding equipment, western wear and more toys and hobbies were added to the inventory. The name was also changed to “Grady’s Sport Shop” – a name by which some people still refer to us today.

In 1969, Grady and Ann decided to focus on the core business – hunting and fishing. The store was moved one door down in the Belvedere Plaza to a 3,600 sf location. The variety of hunting and fishing equipment was expanded and a mail-order division was started. Grady began producing direct-mail flyers which are still our most effective form of advertising today.

Explosive growth came in the early 70's and the store was moved 3 doors down in the Belvedere Plaza to a 7,000 sf building – almost double the size of the previous location. 10 years later, Grady and Ann felt that a free-standing building would best serve our customers. Property was secured in our current location and a 9,800 sf building was constructed. The name was also changed to “Grady’s Great Outdoors” at this time.

Over the last 22 years, the original structure has been expanded and remodeled to its current 19,000+ sf size.

Our current line-up of products includes: Hunting, Fishing, Camping, Kayaks & Canoes, Casual & Work Clothing, Casual & Work Footwear and much more!! We carry virtually all of the major brands as well as many hard-to-find specialty items.

Grady’s Great Outdoors continues to be owned and operated by the Phillips Family. We cannot express how much we appreciate the support of our customers over the last 50 years. We look forward to serving you for the next 50 years!

title: For Sale:  Trijicon TR231
postcontent:
The Trijicon AccuPoint features advanced fiber optics and several intelligent features that make this scope the right choice for all light conditions and even the harshest environments. All models in the AccuPoint Series operate battery free-eliminating the potential for failure during critical moments in the field. They also feature Trijicon's Manual Brightness Adjustment Override, which allows you to control the light output of the fiber-optics during daylight. AccuPoint riflescopes include other advanced elements like multi-layer coated lenses for superior light transmission with no distortion, quick-focus eyepiece, long-eye relief, and precise windage and elevation adjustments. The AccuPoint's rugged construction protects it from the toughest elements. It's crafted from aircraft-quality, hard-anodized aluminum with a tube that's nitrogen-filled to prevent corrosion and eliminate fogging. A solid black-matte finish eliminates glare and light reflection, which could spook game. And, it's water resistant, so the AccuPoint is able to handle even the most challenging hunting conditions.

SPECIFICATIONS:
Magnification:5-20x
Objective:50mm
Field of View:19.1 - 5.1 ft @ 100 yds
Eye Relief:3.8 - 4.1"
Tube Diameter:30mm
Length:13.6" w/out Sunshade
Weight:26.9 oz w/o Sunshade
Finish:Matte Black
Reticle:Standard Duplex Crosshair w/Amber DotAdj

Horseback riding equipment, western wear and more toys and hobbies were added to the inventory. The name was also changed to “Grady’s Sport Shop” – a name by which some people still refer to us today.

In 1969, Grady and Ann decided to focus on the core business – hunting and fishing. The store was moved one door down in the Belvedere Plaza to a 3,600 sf location. The variety of hunting and fishing equipment was expanded and a mail-order division was started. Grady began producing direct-mail flyers which are still our most effective form of advertising today.

Explosive growth came in the early 70's and the store was moved 3 doors down in the Belvedere Plaza to a 7,000 sf building – almost double the size of the previous location. 10 years later, Grady and Ann felt that a free-standing building would best serve our customers. Property was secured in our current location and a 9,800 sf building was constructed. The name was also changed to “Grady’s Great Outdoors” at this time.

Over the last 22 years, the original structure has been expanded and remodeled to its current 19,000+ sf size.

Our current line-up of products includes: Hunting, Fishing, Camping, Kayaks & Canoes, Casual & Work Clothing, Casual & Work Footwear and much more!! We carry virtually all of the major brands as well as many hard-to-find specialty items.

Grady’s Great Outdoors continues to be owned and operated by the Phillips Family. We cannot express how much we appreciate the support of our customers over the last 50 years. We look forward to serving you for the next 50 years!

title: For Sale/Trade:  9mm MP5/94 HK clone
postcontent: I have a Bobcat Weapons BW5 HK MP5/94 clone chambered for 9mm that I have up for sale or trade. I have taken the rifle to the range to test for functionality and ran three and a half magazines through it with no issues. The rifle does have a Silver colored ejector spring, but that can be replaced with a Copper colored HK spring for around $5 if you choose to do so. This rifle also has a 8 1/2" three lug barrel making it a perfect candidate for an SBR and is compatible with all HK MP5/94 components. The rifle also has a metal Cocking handle support and not the plastic one that you will find on some other clones. These weapons are somewhat rare and you will probably have a hard time finding another for sale. I am asking $1700 and am pretty firm on that, but will entertain reasonable offers.

(M)odel Contour Frame

The ideal grip angle of the XD® has been carried over to the XDM, but slightly modified contours in the grip will leave you wondering whether you're gripping the gun or it's gripping you.

(M)ajor Grasp Slide Serrations

Deeper, longer, and more slide serrations equals a better more penetrating grasp.

(M)ega-Lock Texture
The "all-terrain" look of the new XDM isn't about cosmetics, it's about function.
The angle and depth of each contour in the grip has been calculated for maximized control vertically, horizontally and torsionally.

(M)elonite
Traditional black oxide finishes are a few millionths of an inch thick and offer no corrosion resistance.
The rugged Melonite® finish on the XDM is a salt bath nitriding process that leaves a thick, corrosion-resistant, hard surface.

(M)atch Grade Barrel

Rivaling aerospace manufacturing, the XDM match-grade barrel takes precision manufacturing to a whole new level never available within the firearms industry.

(M)inimal Reset Trigger
The new XDM trigger has the shortest travel than any currently available polymer pistol along with a similarly short reset which keeps you on target with greater ease for faster, more accurate follow-up shots.

The Standards

In 2001, Springfield Armory® set out to show its customers, the firearms industry, and the rest of the world a whole new standard in ergonomic design and available features.
With the introduction of the XD® polymer pistol, they did just that….

Loaded Chamber Indicator

The loaded chamber indicator allows the shooter to verify visually or by touch, and without a doubt, that there is a round in the chamber.
Striker Status Indicator

The shooter can check the striker status indicator by sight or touch to verify the striker is in the cocked position.

Grip Safety

Allows it to fire only when the shooter has a firm grip on the pistol.

USA Trigger System™

The Ultra Safety Assurance USA Trigger System™ guards against accidental discharge from dropping or bumping by locking the XD's trigger in place until direct, rearward pressure is applied.

title: For Sale/Trade:  9mm MP5/94 HK clone
postcontent: I have a Bobcat Weapons BW5 HK MP5/94 clone chambered for 9mm that I have up for sale or trade. I have taken the rifle to the range to test for functionality and ran three and a half magazines through it with no issues. The rifle does have a Silver colored ejector spring, but that can be replaced with a Copper colored HK spring for around $5 if you choose to do so. This rifle also has a 8 1/2" three lug barrel making it a perfect candidate for an SBR and is compatible with all HK MP5/94 components. The rifle also has a metal Cocking handle support and not the plastic one that you will find on some other clones. These weapons are somewhat rare and you will probably have a hard time finding another for sale. I am asking $1700 and am pretty firm on that, but will entertain reasonable offers.

title: For Sale:  Home Defense / Tactical Shooting Skills Development
location: Maysville / New Bern / Emerald Isle, Jacksonville, North Carolina
postcontent:
NOTE: THIS IS NOT A BEGINNER'S COURSE. *You must be able to prove you have ample shooting experience

$ Discount $: If you have attended any of our other courses, we’ll take an additional ten dollars off the price of this course.

The Personal Protection In the Home course teaches defensive / tactical shooting skills which cannot be taught on a typical "box" range. 

This intermediate level course enables experienced shooters to move to cover, shoot from behind barricades, develop and employ advanced Flash-Sight-Picture skills, and much more. 

We cover mindset, legal issues, decision-making under pressure, and planning for the worst. 

This course is designed around the use of the defensive pistol where standard marksmanship skills will not work, and will better enable you to survive a felonious attack.

Topical areas include:

1. Defensive Shooting / Rapid Engagement

2. Defensive Handgun Skills

3. Firearms and the Law: Possession, Ownership, and the Use of Deadly Force

4. Strategies for Home Safety and Responding to a Violent Confrontation

5. Selecting a Handgun for Personal Defense

6. Three hours of Range Shooting

7. Course Review and Examination

Students will receive the NRA Guide to the Basics of Personal Protection in the Home handbook and intensive lessons on basics of defensive shooting, issues of self-defense, and other strategies for protecting the home and family.

Students will receive feedback on their shooting exercises, and a National Rifle Association (NRA) certificate upon successful completion of this course. Not only are shooting standards fired during the practical exercises, but a written exam will be given at the end of the course. Throughout the course an individual checklist may be used to ensure the satisfactory absorption of the material being taught.

Our next PPITH Course is scheduled for September 29th, 2012. Don't wait, sign up now! 

For more information visit our website at www.PatriotTAC.com, and be sure to like us Facebook!

* Proof of shooting experience can be one of the following: NRA Basic Pistol Course Certificate, NRA FIRST Steps Course Certificate, NRA pistol competitive shooting qualification card, military DD 214 with pistol qualification, or passing the Pre-Course Assessment

title: For Sale:  Springfield Trapdoor Rifle  Model 1888
postcontent:
All of the marks shown are perfectly normal and standard. In addition to the basic proofs [V P eaglehead P] [SWP 1890] and (P), the smaller marks and symbols are internal SA departmental codings, in some cases worker's initials, whose meaning has not been established. The bore grooves on this rifle looks very deep.

The Following Info I have gotten from folks who are supposed to be experts
The arm really is a Model 1884! "Model 1888", while it had SOME contemporary usage is MOSTLY a term of modern collector convenience, to indicate the final version of the rod-bayonet.
Now, there WERE 100 rifles (noted as having a "positive cam") actually marked "U.S. Model 1888" but they were experimental only - having a modification to the locking mechanism - they occur in the 4155xx range, and must not be confused with the normal rod-bayonet rifles, of which over 60,000 were produced.
Payment for rifle is with US Postal Service money order or cash

title: For Sale/Trade:  9mm HK MP5 Clone
postcontent: I have a Bobcat Weapons BW5 HK MP5/94 clone chambered for 9mm that I have up for sale or trade. I have taken the rifle to the range to test for functionality and ran three and a half magazines through it with no issues. The rifle does have a Silver colored ejector spring, but that can be replaced with a Copper colored HK spring for around $5 if you choose to do so. This rifle also has a 8 1/2" three lug barrel making it a perfect candidate for an SBR and is compatible with all HK MP5/94 components. The rifle also has a metal Cocking handle support and not the plastic one that you will find on some other clones. These weapons are somewhat rare and you will probably have a hard time finding another for sale. I am asking $1700 and am pretty firm on that, but will entertain reasonable offers.

title: For Sale:  Glock G 29 SF 10mm Package with lots of extras
postcontent:
I have a PERFECT Glock 29 SF 3rd gen that comes with everything you would ever buy to rock your glock. Read everything before you cry about the price. If the price is too high, then don't contact me telling me just mumble to yourself in peace. You could always order one from Buds....oh wait, Buds doesn't have any. This is perfect inside and out, 210 rounds through it. The package includes..........and I will NOT seperate anything. 
Glock G29 SF 
Has Trijicon HD (Heavy Duty) hardened night sights. Front sight glows green but has hi-viz orange dot you can see in the daytime and lines up with rear sight curve, rear sights glow green-swiss tritium. You can rack the slide on these sights and you'll never break them or lose zero-$143.00
Lone Wolf 10-40 conversion barrel. Just swap the barrel and it's ready for all the .40 you can put through it. Uses same mags and extractor-$130.00
Don Hume open front/flip front leather belt holster with strap. Just open strap with your thumb and flip the gun forward ready to shoot. You don't have to draw it out straight up-$65.00
Ghost extended slide release-$15.00
Ghost Ultimate trigger kit-has skeleton connector, firing pin spring, trigger spring, safety detent spring-makes for a perfect 3.5lb trigger with super fast reset-$30.00
Both factory mags have Pearce Grip/Pinky extensions-$15.00
You also get 100 rounds of new 10mm FMJ 185 grain target ammo, 50 rounds of PPU hollow points, and 40 rounds (yes, I tested 10 for function) Underwood hand loaded evil ass hollowpoints. Watch youtube videos for Underwood ammo tests-it's rated at 1300 FPS but always runs at 1330-1360 and had the deepest penetration through ballistic gel he'd every seen from a semi-auto pistol. 
No, I don't want your bass boat, quad, old camper, new or old kittehs, or anything not gun related. $925.00 is the CASH price. I will take all firearms related trade offers but don't expect full retail for your gun and the cash price on mine. Find a G29SF and add all this up and you're still getting a great deal. If the whole package isn't what you want no problem, G29's are still available nib everywhere. They run about $625 Buy it Now on gunbroker once you add shipping, insurance, and FFL fees. Then you can run out and buy some 10mm at $35.00 a box and just buy all the other goodies later-but you don't have to let me know about it.
